verses.verse: הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> The word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> came אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> that came to Jeremiah מֵאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֧ר <S%H559><s%> Thus speaketh יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying כְּתָב־ <S%H3789><s%> Write לְךָ֗ אֵ֧ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדְּבָרִ֛ים <S%H1697><s%> thee all the words אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which דִּבַּ֥רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> that I have spoken אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> about אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to you סֵֽפֶר׃ <S%H5612><s%> unto thee in a book

כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> For הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> behold יָמִ֤ים <S%H3117><s%> For lo the days בָּאִים֙ <S%H935><s%> come נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְ֠שַׁבְתִּי <S%H7725><s%> that I will bring again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁב֨וּת <S%H7622><s%> the captivity עַמִּ֧י <S%H5971><s%> of my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וִֽיהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> and Judah אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֗ים <S%H7725><s%> and I will cause them to return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> to the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> i נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> that I gave לַאֲבוֹתָ֖ם <S%H1><s%> to their fathers וִֽירֵשֽׁוּהָ׃ <S%H3423><s%> and they shall possess פ

וְאֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> now these הַדְּבָרִ֗ים <S%H1697><s%> And these [are] the words אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> concerning יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> concerning Israel וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and concerning יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> and concerning Judah

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> For כֹה֙ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> a voice חֲרָדָ֖ה <S%H2731><s%> of trembling שָׁמָ֑עְנוּ <S%H8085><s%> We have heard פַּ֖חַד <S%H6343><s%> of fear וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> and not of peace

שַׁאֲלוּ־ <S%H7592><s%> Ask נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> now וּרְא֔וּ <S%H7200><s%> ye now and see אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If יֹלֵ֖ד <S%H3205><s%> doth travail with child זָכָ֑ר <S%H2145><s%> whether a man מַדּוּעַ֩ <S%H4069><s%> Why רָאִ֨יתִי <S%H7200><s%> ? wherefore do I see כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every גֶּ֜בֶר <S%H1397><s%> every man יָדָ֤יו <S%H3027><s%> with his hands עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on חֲלָצָיו֙ <S%H2504><s%> on his loins כַּיּ֣וֹלֵדָ֔ה <S%H3205><s%> as a woman in travail וְנֶהֶפְכ֥וּ <S%H2015><s%> are turned כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every פָּנִ֖ים <S%H6440><s%> and all faces לְיֵרָקֽוֹן׃ <S%H3420><s%> greenish

ה֗וֹי <S%H1945><s%> Alas כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for גָד֛וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [is] great הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> for that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מֵאַ֣יִן <S%H369><s%> so that כָּמֹ֑הוּ <S%H3644><s%> like וְעֵֽת־ <S%H6256><s%> none [is] like it it [is] even the time צָרָ֥ה <S%H6869><s%> trouble הִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he לְיַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob's וּמִמֶּ֖נָּה <S%H4480><s%> at יִוָּשֵֽׁעַ׃ <S%H3467><s%> but he shall be saved

וְהָיָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> shall come בַיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> For it shall come to pass in that day הַה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נְאֻ֣ם ׀ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֗וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֶשְׁבֹּ֤ר <S%H7665><s%> [that] I will break עֻלּוֹ֙ <S%H5923><s%> his yoke מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> off צַוָּארֶ֔ךָ <S%H6677><s%> from off thy neck וּמוֹסְרוֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H4147><s%> thy bonds אֲנַתֵּ֑ק <S%H5423><s%> and will burst וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> will no יַעַבְדוּ־ <S%H5647><s%> shall no more serve ב֥וֹ ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer זָרִֽים׃ <S%H2114><s%> and strangers

וְעָ֣בְד֔וּ <S%H5647><s%> But they shall serve אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> their God וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> and David מַלְכָּ֔ם <S%H4428><s%> their king אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom אָקִ֖ים <S%H6965><s%> whom I will raise up לָהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> like ס

וְאַתָּ֡ה <S%H859><s%> you אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תִּירָא֩ <S%H3372><s%> Therefore fear עַבְדִּ֨י <S%H5650><s%> thou not O my servant יַעֲקֹ֤ב <S%H3290><s%> Jacob נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהֹוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּחַ֣ת <S%H2865><s%> neither be dismayed יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> O Israel כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> for הִנְנִ֤י <S%H2005><s%> behold מוֹשִֽׁיעֲךָ֙ <S%H3467><s%> for lo I will save מֵֽרָח֔וֹק <S%H7350><s%> thee from afar וְאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> זַרְעֲךָ֖ <S%H2233><s%> and thy seed מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> from the land שִׁבְיָ֑ם <S%H7628><s%> of their captivity וְשָׁ֧ב <S%H7725><s%> shall return יַעֲקֹ֛ב <S%H3290><s%> and Jacob וְשָׁקַ֥ט <S%H8252><s%> and shall be in rest וְשַׁאֲנַ֖ן <S%H7599><s%> and be quiet וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and no מַחֲרִֽיד׃ <S%H2729><s%> and none shall make [him] afraid

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אִתְּךָ֥ <S%H854><s%> for אֲנִ֛י <S%H589><s%> I נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> For I [am] with thee saith יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לְהֽוֹשִׁיעֶ֑ךָ <S%H3467><s%> to save כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for אֶעֱשֶׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> thee though I make כָלָ֜ה <S%H3617><s%> a full end בְּכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּוֹיִ֣ם ׀ <S%H1471><s%> of all nations אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> I הֲפִצוֹתִ֣יךָ <S%H6327><s%> whither I have scattered שָּׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> in it אַ֤ךְ <S%H389><s%> Only אֹֽתְךָ֙ <S%H854><s%> and will by לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no אֶעֱשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> thee yet will I not make כָלָ֔ה <S%H3617><s%> a full end וְיִסַּרְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H3256><s%> of thee but I will correct לַמִּשְׁפָּ֔ט <S%H4941><s%> thee in measure וְנַקֵּ֖ה <S%H5352><s%> and will not leave thee altogether לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> no אֲנַקֶּֽךָּ׃ <S%H5352><s%> unpunished פ

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For כֹ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> For thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אָנ֣וּשׁ <S%H605><s%> [is] incurable לְשִׁבְרֵ֑ךְ <S%H7667><s%> Thy bruise נַחְלָ֖ה <S%H2470><s%> [is] grievous מַכָּתֵֽךְ׃ <S%H4347><s%> [and] thy wound

אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> There דָּ֥ן <S%H1777><s%> [There is] none to plead דִּינֵ֖ךְ <S%H1779><s%> thy cause לְמָז֑וֹר <S%H4205><s%> that thou mayest be bound up רְפֻא֥וֹת <S%H7499><s%> medicines תְּעָלָ֖ה <S%H8585><s%> thou hast no healing אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> is no לָֽךְ׃

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All מְאַהֲבַ֣יִךְ <S%H157><s%> All thy lovers שְׁכֵח֔וּךְ <S%H7911><s%> have forgotten אוֹתָ֖ךְ <S%H853><s%> לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יִדְרֹ֑שׁוּ <S%H1875><s%> thee they seek כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> with מַכַּ֨ת <S%H4347><s%> thee with the wound אוֹיֵ֤ב <S%H341><s%> of an enemy הִכִּיתִיךְ֙ <S%H5221><s%> thee not for I have wounded מוּסַ֣ר <S%H4148><s%> with the chastisement אַכְזָרִ֔י <S%H394><s%> of a cruel one עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> Because רֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> for the multitude עֲוֹנֵ֔ךְ <S%H5771><s%> of thine iniquity עָצְמ֖וּ <S%H6105><s%> were increased חַטֹּאתָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H2403><s%> [because] thy sins

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> Why תִּזְעַק֙ <S%H2199><s%> Why criest עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over שִׁבְרֵ֔ךְ <S%H7667><s%> affliction אָנ֖וּשׁ <S%H605><s%> [is] incurable מַכְאֹבֵ֑ךְ <S%H4341><s%> grief עַ֣ל ׀ <S%H5921><s%> Because רֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> for the multitude עֲוֹנֵ֗ךְ <S%H5771><s%> of thine iniquity עָֽצְמוּ֙ <S%H6105><s%> were increased חַטֹּאתַ֔יִךְ <S%H2403><s%> [because] thy sins עָשִׂ֥יתִי <S%H6213><s%> I have done אֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these לָֽךְ׃

לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֹכְלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H398><s%> Therefore all they that devour יֵאָכֵ֔לוּ <S%H398><s%> thee shall be devoured וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all צָרַ֥יִךְ <S%H6862><s%> and all thine adversaries כֻּלָּ֖ם <S%H3605><s%> every בַּשְּׁבִ֣י <S%H7628><s%> into captivity יֵלֵ֑כוּ <S%H1980><s%> will go וְהָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> become שֹׁאסַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H7601><s%> spoil לִמְשִׁסָּ֔ה <S%H4933><s%> thee shall be a spoil וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> one בֹּזְזַ֖יִךְ <S%H962><s%> and all that prey אֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> upon thee will I give לָבַֽז׃ <S%H957><s%> for a prey

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> Because אַעֲלֶ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> For I will restore אֲרֻכָ֥ה <S%H724><s%> health לָ֛ךְ וּמִמַּכּוֹתַ֥יִךְ <S%H4347><s%> thee of thy wounds אֶרְפָּאֵ֖ךְ <S%H7495><s%> unto thee and I will heal נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Because נִדָּחָה֙ <S%H5080><s%> thee an Outcast קָ֣רְאוּ <S%H7121><s%> because they called לָ֔ךְ צִיּ֣וֹן <S%H6726><s%> [saying] This [is] Zion הִ֔יא <S%H1931><s%> he דֹּרֵ֖שׁ <S%H1875><s%> whom no man seeketh after אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> no לָֽהּ׃ ס

כֹּ֣ה ׀ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הִנְנִי־ <S%H2005><s%> behold שָׁב֙ <S%H7725><s%> Behold I will bring again שְׁבוּת֙ <S%H7622><s%> the captivity אָהֳלֵ֣י <S%H168><s%> tents יַֽעֲק֔וֹב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob's וּמִשְׁכְּנֹתָ֖יו <S%H4908><s%> on his dwellingplaces אֲרַחֵ֑ם <S%H7355><s%> and have mercy וְנִבְנְתָ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> shall be builded עִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> and the city עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on תִּלָּ֔הּ <S%H8510><s%> upon her own heap וְאַרְמ֖וֹן <S%H759><s%> and the palace עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on מִשְׁפָּט֥וֹ <S%H4941><s%> after the manner יֵשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> shall remain

וְיָצָ֥א <S%H3318><s%> And out of them shall proceed מֵהֶ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> like תּוֹדָ֖ה <S%H8426><s%> thanksgiving וְק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and the voice מְשַׂחֲקִ֑ים <S%H7832><s%> of them that make merry וְהִרְבִּתִים֙ <S%H7235><s%> and I will multiply וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and they יִמְעָ֔טוּ <S%H4591><s%> them and they shall not be few וְהִכְבַּדְתִּ֖ים <S%H3513><s%> I will also glorify וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and they יִצְעָֽרוּ׃ <S%H6819><s%> them and they shall not be small

וְהָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בָנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> Their children כְּקֶ֔דֶם <S%H6924><s%> also shall be as aforetime וַעֲדָת֖וֹ <S%H5712><s%> and their congregation לְפָנַ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before תִּכּ֑וֹן <S%H3559><s%> shall be established וּפָ֣קַדְתִּ֔י <S%H6485><s%> me and I will punish עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לֹחֲצָֽיו׃ <S%H3905><s%> all that oppress
